name: Zeus
description: King of the gods, Zeus is the ruler of Mount Olympus and the god of the sky and thunder.

name: Hera
description: Queen of the gods, Hera is the goddess of marriage and family.

name: Poseidon
description: God of the sea, Poseidon rules the seas and controls earthquakes.

name: Hades
description: God of the underworld, Hades governs the underworld and the dead.

name: Athena
description: Goddess of wisdom, Athena is the goddess of wisdom, courage, and warfare.

name: Apollo
description: God of the sun and arts, Apollo is the god of the sun, music, and prophecy.

name: Artemis
description: Goddess of the hunt, Artemis is the goddess of the hunt, wilderness, and wild animals.

name: Ares
description: God of war, Ares is the god of war and violence.

name: Aphrodite
description: Goddess of love, Aphrodite is the goddess of love, beauty, and desire.

name: Hephaestus
description: God of fire and forge, Hephaestus is the god of fire, metalworking, and crafts.

name: Hermes
description: Messenger of the gods, Hermes is the god of trade, thieves, travelers, and sports.

name: Demeter
description: Goddess of the harvest, Demeter is the goddess of agriculture and fertility.

name: Dionysus
description: God of wine, Dionysus is the god of wine, pleasure, and festivity.

name: Persephone
description: Queen of the underworld, Persephone is the goddess of spring growth and the wife of Hades.

name: Helios
description: God of the sun, Helios is the god who drives the chariot of the sun across the sky.

name: Selene
description: Goddess of the moon, Selene is the goddess who drives the chariot of the moon across the sky.

name: Eros
description: God of love, Eros is the god of love and attraction.

name: Hypnos
description: God of sleep, Hypnos is the personification of sleep.

name: Nike
description: Goddess of victory, Nike is the goddess of victory in both war and peaceful competition.

name: Tyche
description: Goddess of fortune, Tyche is the goddess of fortune and prosperity.

name: Iris
description: Goddess of the rainbow, Iris is the messenger of the gods and the goddess of the rainbow.

name: Pan
description: God of the wild, Pan is the god of the wild, shepherds, and flocks.

name: Nemesis
description: Goddess of retribution, Nemesis is the goddess of revenge and retribution.

name: Hestia
description: Goddess of the hearth, Hestia is the goddess of the hearth, home, and domesticity.
